name: The Shape (Exkaiser)
description:
A prototype of an horror game for the Weekly Game Jam 149 made by Cyberebral (https://cyberebral.itch.io/) and I.

Plot :

In the near future, asteroid mining has become one of the main objectives of the space conquest.

You are a machine operator sent on the first mining station on 4660 Nereus.
As you were about to find the precious resources, something went wrong. Something that was not supposed to be there.

As you wake up, you might think that you are the last survivor :  Find your crew and try to understand what happened.

Controls :

WASD to move
E to interact

Side note regarding development :

We took a lot of time on planning (scenario, design documents, researches) and a full version is  out of the scope for a week-long jam. This prototype is more of a demo scene (there's not much to do, it's only the starting zone).

Updates towards the true version should come soon after the jam.
